sentences.english: Imagine a tick-tack-toe grid in your viewfinder.
sentences.chinese: 想象取景器中一點一點移動的柵格。

sentences.english: Be sensitive to the scene in your viewfinder.
sentences.chinese: 要注意你取景器中的畫面。

sentences.english: Look for elements that will reinforce your feeling and convey it to the viewer.
sentences.chinese: 尋找增加你的這種整體感覺的元素並通過取景器觀察。

sentences.english: The extra wobble and zoomed-in focusing would make a viewfinder very welcome here.
sentences.chinese: 額外的擺動和放大的聚焦會使取景器非常歡迎。

sentences.english: Anchor your weight equally on both feet, and lower your left eye to the viewfinder.
sentences.chinese: 保持身體的重量分配在兩隻腳上，用左眼觀察取景器。

sentences.english: The viewfinder image will darken when the previewAE lock button is pressed.
sentences.chinese: 當按壓預景深自動曝光鎖定按鈕時，取景器相將變暗。

sentences.english: But you can check it right away by just looking through the viewfinder.
sentences.chinese: 但是你馬上就可在取景器中查看。

sentences.english: Electronic viewfinders usually larger than entry-level SLR optical viewfinders
sentences.chinese: 電子取景器比一般入門單反光學取景器更大。

sentences.english: Electronic viewfinders usually larger than entry-level SLR optical viewfinders
sentences.chinese: 電子取景器比一般入門單反光學取景器更大。

sentences.english: Electronic viewfinders cannot match the clarity of a good optical finder
sentences.chinese: 電子取景器清晰度還無法和光學取景器相比。

sentences.english: Electronic viewfinders cannot match the clarity of a good optical finder
sentences.chinese: 電子取景器清晰度還無法和光學取景器相比。

sentences.english: This invention also discloses a process device for images in viewfinders.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還公開了一種對取景器中圖像的處理裝置。

sentences.english: American footballers wear shoulder-pads for protection.
sentences.chinese: 把揹帶穿過取景器蓋和肩墊。

definition: rectangular frame used to view a scene (made out of cardboard etc, or formed by the thumbs and forefingers)/viewfinder/viewing frame
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
see 單反相機|单反相机[dan1 fan3 xiang4 ji1]
